text: 18.5: Ru 11.7-8Kha mana rimgi mbik, ana ne ndɨkndɨgi fhuvara, ana zazera zav won kurkura zav na nzuav simtɨgar na ndɨɨi.’ Ana mba ndɨkndɨga muuŋgiap, mbaram khaŋ wo nzuai, ‘Mbara muuŋ, gu ana kurav ana suaŋv suanga. Gu maaŋ muuŋ tharga, ana zazera zɨv na suaŋv kɨrim, gu guigira anan vhugu rivgi.’ ”
